summary: This mod turns all vanilla male hairstyles and some beards (For Player Character) to HDTFor those who are confused, it should work with textures replacers but not meshes replacers.Requirements - HDT physics extensions- SKSE- 1.9.32.0v
descriptionHtml:

[size=6]Thank you @[/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/42532700][size=6]LoneNorseman[/size][/url][size=6] for this video [/size]

A lot of people were looking for Male Hair with physics so here it is
would love to ur characters with this mod :D

[youtube]vh1d981XDyY[/youtube]
Video showing the mod in-game

[size=6]If you are having "the helmet glitch" try this fix [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88223/][size=6]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88223/[/size][/url]

If anyone have any problem with it, just send me a message [url=https://twitter.com/Kaidra_OE]https://twitter.com/Kaidra_OE[/url], bcuz I rarely open nexus.
